channel.title: New whip Movement/Image
channel.description:
How do I make the new whip movement and gfx and whatever? I like it somehow, and have no idea how to make this. Do I need to download something like an editor of some sort? I have a sprites editor, interface editor and a cache editor.
Any help will be appreciated. ;)
